trigger.title: Trigger: Placed Block
trigger.description: Triggers when the player places a block.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

location.title: Location
location.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The origin is the location of the block placed, the block state belongs to that block, and the tool is the item used to place the block. The 'this' entity is the player that would get the advancement.
